meanings.definition: Autocrosses: plural noun, a type of motorsport competition involving timed runs through a defined course marked by cones.
meanings.sent1: During the autocrosses, drivers race through a course with cones.
meanings.sent2: The autocrosses held last weekend were thrilling to watch.
meanings.sent3: At the autocrosses, the cones seemed to dance around the cars.
meanings.sent4: The autocrosses were like a puzzle where the cones were the pieces.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of the autocrosses lingered long after the event ended.

meanings.definition: Autocrosses: verb, participates in autocross competitions.
meanings.sent1: She autocrosses every summer to test her driving skills.
meanings.sent2: He autocrosses with a group of friends who share his passion.
meanings.sent3: Autocrossing is his favorite way to spend a sunny afternoon.
meanings.sent4: They autocrossed their way to victory in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The team autocrosses together, enjoying the friendly rivalry.
